name: Kompoz Downloader
tagline: Archive Kompoz stems and mixes for offline production.
description:
Kompoz Downloader keeps collaboration sessions moving by saving Kompoz stems, mixes, and discussions directly to your local workspace. Pull reference takes without manually exporting each track one-by-one.

Use it to back up sessions, prep offline mixing environments, or share approved stems with clients while keeping everything organized by project.
seo_description: Download Kompoz stems and mixes for offline production. Reliable Kompoz downloader for music collaborators.
features: Download stems, mixes, and attachments directly from Kompoz projects
Preserve track naming and folder structure automatically
Batch grab new revisions to keep collaborators in sync
Local-first design keeps creative work private and secure
Works across Windows, macOS, Linux, and modern browsers

pricing.label: One-time payment
pricing.note: Contact us for current licensing options.

faqs.question: Does Kompoz Downloader support private projects?
faqs.answer: Yes. Download stems from projects you have permission to access using your Kompoz account.

faqs.question: Can I sync multiple revisions?
faqs.answer: Queue revisions across several projects and the downloader will fetch them sequentially with clear version naming.

faqs.question: Does it keep metadata?
faqs.answer: Track names, notes, and mix versions stay intact in the exported folders.

faqs.question: Is anything uploaded back to Kompoz?
faqs.answer: No. The downloader only saves files locally; it does not publish changes or upload data.

faqs.question: Does it work with large WAV files?
faqs.answer: Yes. It handles large-format files and automatically resumes if your connection blips.

reviews.name: Tasha Millen
reviews.review: Kompoz Downloader keeps our remote band in sync. I can grab new stems right away and keep mixing without delays.
reviews.title: Faster handoffs for collaborators

reviews.name: Hugo Barrett
reviews.review: I travel with a laptop and need sessions offline. This tool keeps everything structured like the original project.
reviews.title: Great for offline mixing rigs

reviews.name: Priyanka Das
reviews.review: Exporting stems manually was painful. Now I pull entire project folders in minutes.
reviews.title: Saves hours of busywork
